sentences.en: Animation school, like painting an illustrator.
sentences.cn: 学动画的, 喜欢画插画.

sentences.en: Called up for military service, Mr. Marokvia spent the war as an illustrator for the Wehrmacht, applying brush and pencil in Ukraine, Italy, Finland and Yugoslavia.
sentences.cn: 玛洛克维亚先生被征召入伍，他作为一名德国国防军的插图画家，在乌克兰、意大利、芬兰和南斯拉夫留下了自己的墨迹。

sentences.en: Franz Vesolt is a illustrator based in France.
sentences.cn: 弗兰茨·维索特是一位法国的插画师.

sentences.en: He is well - known as an illustrator of children's books.
sentences.cn: 他是个著名的儿童书籍插图画家.

sentences.en: I made mine in Illustrator and added some effects with the mesh tool there.
sentences.cn: 我将自己的一些小东西放在Illustrator中,并用网格工具添加了一些效果.

sentences.en: I prefer to be an illustrator, because there is too much bullshit in fine art.
sentences.cn: 不过我更喜欢被称作插画家, 因为在美术界有太多乱七八糟的事情.

sentences.en: I will need all fonts and images asas the final file in illustrator and pdf format.
sentences.cn: 我需要所有的字体和图像,以及在Illustrator和PDF格式的最后文件.

sentences.en: Illustrator's built in Symbol Sprayer can be a highly useful tool for quickly creating awesome graphics.
sentences.cn: Illustrator内置的SymbolSprayer(图标喷射器)对于快速创建漂亮的图案来说是非常有用的工具.

sentences.en: LL , illustrator and paper - cuts artist based in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 了了北京插画家, 剪纸 艺术家.

sentences.en: Make sure everything we talk in Illustrator is in pixels.
sentences.cn: 同时把所有的单位都改成像素.

sentences.en: My cousin is a freelance illustrator in L . A.
sentences.cn: 我的表兄在洛杉矶做漫画自由撰告人.
她为一位插图画家当模特儿.

sentences.en: She's indexed the book by author, by age, and by illustrator.
sentences.cn: 她根据作者、年龄和插图画家分别为该书编了索引。

sentences.en: So, I am the illustrator of the first three volumes were positioning.
sentences.cn: 于是, 我对这三卷本的插画先作了定位.

sentences.en: Sometimes I sketch on paper and others I start sketching in Illustrator.
sentences.cn: 有时候我在纸上画手绘草稿,有时候在Illustrator里做草图.

sentences.en: The illustrator is going to judge the entries in the children's painting competition.
sentences.cn: 那位插画家将评审儿童绘画比赛的参赛作品.
